'''Krosl''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in the {{Quest|A Teapot to Call Home: Part I}}.

He is a [[Snezhnaya]]n merchant who sought [[Smaragdus Jadeite]] to make hairpins, leading [[Yanfei]] and the [[Traveler]] to seek him out for the rare ore.
